snippet.title: Immortal Rising : IDLE RPG
snippet.description:
[Google Play Store]
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.badbeans.DarkIdle

[Apple App Store]
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/immortal-rising/id1588863558


Dark Fantasy Idle RPG

Rise up as an Immortal, a divine being, to defeat the absolute evil.
A Dark Fantasy Idle RPG with unlimited growth!
Experience the exhilarating action, the thrilling touch, and the fun of endless growth and control.

- Gain experience and gears offline! AFK to grow in this Dark Fantasy Idle RPG, Immortal Rising!

Quickly grow strong with the Idle features that doesn't require connection or manual control!
Enjoy the fun of growth without a touch of a button.


- Compose your own combat preset with over million combination of skills and equipments!

Build your own combat preset by mastering combination of weapons and different skills with different characteristics!
Skill composition allows you to play with different combat style. Overcome enemies with impossible strength with different combat strategies!


- Glamorous action and speedy growth!

Weapons with various animations and spectacular skill effects!
Feel the maximum action with minimal control!
Experience the essence of hack and slash with powerful weapons and skills, through your fingertips!

- Community and Ranking System!

Communicate with other users through chat function, and compete with other users in the ranking system!


- Powerful PVP Battle!

Compete for with other rankers through online arena battle!


- Daily rewards and events!

Just enjoy them! No pressure!

Play the Dark Fantasy Idle RPG Immortal Rising now!


Homepage :
https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=4864673505117639552

Facebook :
https://www.facebook.com/mobirixplayen

YouTube :
https://www.youtube.com/user/mobirix1
